item.title: 空客无人机“母舰”预计三年内首飞
item.description: 空客公司表示，计划在2029年前交付其"母舰"A400M运输机的概念版本。该机型由欧洲客户共同开发，旨在利用该飞机部署无人机和远程打击武器。【原文：Airbus SE said it’s aiming to deliver a concept version of its “mothership” A400M cargo plane by 2029 after developing it with a European customer to use the aircraft to deploy drones and deep strike weapons.】

item.title: 特朗普降低药价的尝试正推高其他国家药价
item.description:
总统的命令正在颠覆瑞士的医疗体系。【原文：

The president’s order is upending health care in Switzerland.

】

item.title: 土耳其国防企业一年内股价飙升236%，瞄准新市场
item.description: 土耳其国有国防承包商阿塞尔桑电子工业公司计划今年至少进军五个新国家，因出口激增和投资者需求推动其股价创下历史新高。【原文：Turkey’s state-run defense contractor Aselsan Elektronik Sanayi plans to expand into at least five new countries this year as surging exports and investor demand push its shares to record gains.】

item.title: 欧洲以社交媒体禁令和巴黎突袭X平台应对科技巨头
item.description: 欧洲各国正对社交媒体发起迄今为止最广泛的打击，越来越多的国家考虑禁止未成年人使用相关服务，这为与美国部分大型企业展开新一轮对抗奠定了基础。【原文：European countries are taking their broadest swipe yet at social media, with a growing number weighing bans of the services for minors and setting the stage for a new showdown with some of the biggest US companies.】

item.title: 托克首席执行官称液化天然气项目需要新的融资方案
item.description: 托克集团首席执行官理查德·霍尔图姆表示，液化天然气行业在项目融资方面需要“一点创新”。【原文：Trafigura Group Chief Executive Officer Richard Holtum said the liquefied natural gas industry needs a “bit of innovation” when it comes to financing projects.】

item.title: 嘉士伯因需求不确定性扩大盈利预期区间
item.description: 嘉士伯集团上调全年营业利润预期，此举反映出这家啤酒生产商对其饮品需求持谨慎态度。【原文：Carlsberg A/S widened its full-year operating profit guidance, in a move that reflects the brewer’s cautious stance over demand for its drinks.】

item.title: 缅甸军政府代理政党在备受争议的选举中获胜
item.description: 缅甸军政府傀儡政党在选举中被宣布以"压倒性优势"获胜，这场被联合国等机构斥为非法的选举，助长了军方对这个饱受战争摧残的国家继续掌控的势力。【原文：A proxy party for Myanmar’s junta was declared the “landslide” winner of elections that were derided as illegitimate by the United Nations and others, helping the military keep its grip on the war-ravaged country.】

item.title: 越南边境突变规致餐车滞留
item.description: 越南政府紧急出台新食品安全规定后，大量农产品运输卡车在边境排起长队。鉴于农历新年期间家庭通常会囤积物资，总理已下令采取紧急措施。【原文：Long lines of produce delivery trucks have been backed up at Vietnam’s borders after the government rushed out new food safety rules, prompting the prime minister to order urgent action ahead of the Lunar New Year, when families traditionally stock up on supplies.】

item.title: 马科斯因腐败指控被驳回而躲过弹劾风险
item.description: 菲律宾国会一个委员会周三决定驳回针对总统小费迪南德·马科斯的弹劾尝试，使其免于被罢免的努力，获得了一年缓刑期。【原文：A Philippine congressional committee on Wednesday moved to dismiss impeachment attempts against President Ferdinand Marcos Jr., granting him a one-year reprieve from efforts to remove him from office.】

item.title: 马斯克团队造访消息推动中国太阳能股上涨
item.description: 中国太阳能股价上涨，此前当地媒体报道称SpaceX和特斯拉公司的团队已访问国内企业，提振了市场情绪。【原文：Chinese solar stocks rallied after local media reported that teams from SpaceX and Tesla Inc. had visited domestic companies, buoying sentiment.】

item.title: 富时100指数期货持稳，英镑走高
英飞凌预测人工智能数据中心需求将推动营收增长
item.description: 英飞凌科技公司表示，将加大对数据中心技术的投入，旨在随着人工智能解决方案需求加速增长，实现营收增长。【原文：Infineon Technologies AG said it would ramp up spending on its technology for data centers, aiming to grow revenue as demand for artificial intelligence solutions picks up speed.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油折扣力度加大，测试印度对美油协议的反应
item.description: 过去十天里，俄罗斯向印度炼油商提供的石油折扣幅度扩大，这引发了一个问题：尽管印度与美国达成的贸易协议要求减少采购量，但炼油商是否仍会因此被鼓励大量购入俄罗斯石油。【原文：Discounts on Russian oil being offered to Indian refiners have widened over the past 10 days, raising the question of whether processors will be encouraged to snap up cargoes despite a trade agreement with the US that hinges on lower purchases.】

item.title: 在暴跌前抛售黄金的富达基金准备再次买入
item.description: 乔治·埃夫斯塔索普洛斯在黄金遭遇四十年最大跌幅前数日抛售了部分持仓。如今他正准备再度买入。【原文：George Efstathopoulos sold a chunk of his gold holdings days before the precious metal’s biggest slide in four decades. Now he’s getting ready to buy again.】

item.title: 安联投资管理公司、NEC资本加入EdgePoint的4.75亿美元贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，东南亚电信塔运营商EdgePoint Infrastructure已从机构投资者和传统银行组成的财团获得4.75亿美元银团贷款。【原文：Southeast Asia telecom tower operator EdgePoint Infrastructure has secured a $475 million syndicated loan from a mix of institutional investors and traditional banks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 韩国特使会晤卢比奥 特朗普新关税政策迫在眉睫
item.description: 韩国外交部长与美国参议员马可·卢比奥会晤之际，该国正竭力避免美国将关税上调至25%的威胁，而首尔议员们则准备审议一项特别法案——该法案是落实去年贸易协定中承诺资金的必要程序。【原文：South Korea’s top diplomat met with Secretary of State Marco Rubio as the country scrambles to avoid a threatened US tariff hike to 25% while lawmakers in Seoul prepare to review a special bill required to implement funding pledged as part of last year’s trade agreement.】

item.title: 默兹寻求在海湾地区达成液化天然气交易以对冲美国能源风险
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希·梅尔茨将目光投向中东地区，试图为欧洲最大经济体多元化能源供应，并减少对美国液化天然气进口的依赖。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz has set his sights on the Middle East to try and diversify energy supplies for Europe’s biggest economy and reduce dependency on LNG imports from the US.】

item.title: 印度在幕后与特朗普进行长期交涉，最终促成美印协议
item.description: 九月初，印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪在中国与弗拉基米尔·普京和习近平举行亲密会晤后不久，便派遣其国家安全顾问前往华盛顿，以帮助修复日渐紧张的双边关系。【原文：In early September, shortly after Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi held a chummy meeting with Vladimir Putin and Xi Jinping in China, he dispatched his national security adviser to Washington to help smooth over fraying ties.】

item.title: 波兰利率路径渐趋模糊，多数分析师预计将维持利率不变
item.description: 经济学家对波兰的利率路径意见日益分歧，多数人预计央行将在经济增长超预期后维持借贷成本不变。【原文：Economists are increasingly split on Poland’s interest-rate path, with a majority expecting the central bank to keep borrowing costs unchanged after faster-than-expected economic growth.】

item.title: 阿布扎比石油巨头计划发行高达20亿美元的点心债
item.description: 阿联酋最大石油生产商阿布扎比国家石油公司计划发行首只人民币债券，这标志着中国与海湾地区的金融联系正在深化。【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co., the United Arab Emirates’ biggest oil producer, is planning to offer its first-ever yuan bond, the latest sign of deepening financial ties between China and the Gulf.】

item.title: 亚马逊与Prosus达成人工智能与云服务合作协议，实现两位数成本节约
item.description: 普罗苏斯公司与亚马逊旗下子公司达成一项多年期云计算与人工智能合作协议，该协议将整合相关领域的合同，从而实现两位数的成本节约。【原文：Prosus NV reached a multi-year cloud and artificial-intelligence deal with an Amazon.com Inc. unit that will consolidate contracts in these spheres, resulting in double-digit cost savings.】

item.title: 中国黄金ETF创纪录资金外流，金属暴跌动摇投资者信心
item.description: 中国主要黄金支持的交易所交易基金创下史上最大单日资金流出纪录——合计近10亿美元——因黄金价格从历史高位骤然回落，投资者信心受到冲击。【原文：China’s major gold-backed exchange-traded funds recorded their biggest ever daily outflows – nearly $1 billion combined – with investor confidence rattled by the metal’s abrupt pullback from an all-time high.】

item.title: 南非股市落后者或将迎来复苏
item.description: 2025年表现滞后的南非股票板块有望迎来复苏，随着矿业股涨势开始降温。【原文：South African equity sectors that lagged behind in 2025 are poised for a recovery as the rally in mining stocks begins to cool.】

item.title: 美国银行加入高盛行列，上调人民币汇率预期以提振出口
item.description: 美国银行公司上调了人民币汇率预测，加入华尔街其他银行的行列，纷纷提高预期，押注中国央行将容忍人民币进一步升值。【原文：Bank of America Corp. boosted its forecast for the yuan, joining other Wall Street banks in raising their estimates on bets that China’s central bank will tolerate further gains in the currency.】

item.title: 印尼首富旗下企业计划回购股票应对市场暴跌
item.description: 与印尼亿万富翁普拉乔戈·潘格斯图有关联的公司表示，将回购股份以支撑股价，此前上周股市暴跌。【原文：Companies linked to Indonesian billionaire Prajogo Pangestu said they would buy back shares, in a bid to shore up prices after last week’s market meltdown.】

item.title: 澳大利亚考虑设定矿产价格下限以吸引海外资金
item.description: 澳大利亚正考虑为稀土等关键矿产设定最低价格，此举提振了当地生产商股价。该国旨在打破中国的垄断地位，吸引外国投资进入新矿山和加工项目。【原文：Australia is weighing a price floor for critical minerals including rare earths, a move that sent local producers’ shares higher, as it seeks to counter China’s dominance and lure foreign investment into new mines and processing projects.】

item.title: 印度监管机构考虑改革银行监管机制以遏制风险
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度金融监管机构正考虑改革其对贷款机构的监管方式，从传统的勾选式审查转向对银行商业模式的深度审查。【原文：India’s financial regulator is considering a revamp of how it supervises lenders, shifting from a traditional box-checking exercise to a deeper examination of banks’ business models, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 生发生物制药公司Veradermics首次公开募股筹集2.56亿美元
item.description: 专注于头发修复的生物制药公司Veradermics Inc.通过扩大规模的美国首次公开募股（IPO）筹集了2.563亿美元，定价高于其预告区间的上限。【原文：Veradermics Inc., a biopharmaceutical firm focused on hair restoration, raised $256.3 million in an upsized US initial public offering priced above the top of its marketed range.】

item.title: 中国新零售账户数量跃升至2024年繁荣期以来最高水平
item.description: 中国股市1月份的上涨吸引了大批追涨交易者，导致新开户数量激增。【原文：China’s stock rally in January drew a rush of momentum-chasing traders, prompting a surge in new account openings.】

item.title: 铜价持续上涨，投资者在下跌后重返大宗商品市场
item.description: 铜价领涨，创下逾三年最大单日涨幅，因大宗商品再度受到市场追捧，且投资者正评估中国需求前景。【原文：Copper held the bulk of the biggest one-day advance in more than three years, as the metal benefited from a renewed wave of interest in commodities and investors assessed the outlook for Chinese demand.】
